title: The agreement of the associated ministers & churches of the counties of Cumberland, and VVestmerland: with something for explication and exhortation annexed.
author: Gilpin, Richard, 1625-1700.
publisher: Printed by T.L. for Simon VVaterson, & are sold at the sign of the Globe in Pauls Church-yard, and by Richard Scot, bookseller in Carlisle,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
